verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> it from <S%H72>Ebenezer<s%> to <S%H795>Ashdod.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon,<s%> and <S%H3322>set<s%> it <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon.<s%>

When they of <S%H796>Ashdod<s%> arose <S%H7925>early<s%> on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> <S%H1712>behold,<s%> Dagon was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> They <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon,<s%> and <S%H7725>set<s%> him in his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

When they arose <S%H7925>early<s%> on the next <S%H4283>day<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H1712>behold,<s%> Dagon was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were cut <S%H3772>off<s%> on the <S%H4670>threshold.<s%> Only <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>'s torso was <S%H7604>intact.<s%>

Therefore neither the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon,<s%> nor any who <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H1869>tread<s%> on the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> in <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on them of <S%H796>Ashdod,<s%> and he <S%H8074>destroyed<s%> <S%H5221>them,<s%> and struck them with <S%H2914>tumors,<s%> even <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> and its <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

When the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H559>so,<s%> they said, "The <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not <S%H3427>stay<s%> with <S%H3027>us;<s%> for his hand is <S%H7185>severe<s%> on <S%H1712>us,<s%> and on Dagon our <S%H430>god.<s%>"

They <S%H7971>sent<s%> therefore and <S%H622>gathered<s%> all the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> and said, "What shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>" They <S%H559>answered,<s%> "Let the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be carried <S%H5437>over<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>" They <S%H5437>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5437>there.<s%>

It was <S%H310>so,<s%> that after they had carried it <S%H5437>about,<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was against the <S%H5892>city<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>confusion:<s%> and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great;<s%> and <S%H2914>tumors<s%> broke out on <S%H8368>them.<s%>

So they <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron.<s%> It <S%H727>happened,<s%> as the ark of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> that the <S%H6139>Ekronites<s%> cried <S%H2199>out,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "They have brought <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4191>us,<s%> to kill us and our <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

They <S%H7971>sent<s%> therefore and gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Send <S%H7971>away<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and let it go <S%H7725>again<s%> to its own <S%H4725>place,<s%> that it not <S%H4191>kill<s%> us and our <S%H5971>people.<s%>" For there was a <S%H4194>deadly<s%> <S%H4103>confusion<s%> throughout all the <S%H5892>city;<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> heavy <S%H3513>there.<s%>
The <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H4191>didn't<s%> die were <S%H5221>struck<s%> with the <S%H2914>tumors;<s%> and the <S%H7775>cry<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
